## Section 3.0

Everything has probability zero in a continuous distribution.

For a uniform distribution $\pi(\theta)$ is 1

$\pi({0.5}) = \int_{0}^{0.5}\pi(\theta)\, \mathrm{d}\theta = 0.5$
